pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Interactive Web Maps Using 'The National Map' Services // Creates interactive web maps using the 'JavaScript' 'Leaflet' library with base layers of 'The National Map' ('TNM'). 'TNM' services provide access to base geospatial information that describes the landscape of the United States and its territories. This package is dependent on, and intended to be used with, the 'leaflet' package.
